languages.text: "Пусть приходят — не придется выискивать этих трусливых выродков по их темным норам".
"Let them come to us — it will save us from having to hunt these cowardly wretches in their dark dens."
languages.original_text: "Пусть приходят — не придется выискивать этих трусливых выродков по их темным норам".

traits.locale_text: "Let them come to us — it will save us from having to hunt these cowardly wretches in their dark dens."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Let them come to us — it will save us from having to hunt these cowardly wretches in their dark dens."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Let them come to us — it will save us from having to hunt these cowardly wretches in their dark dens."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Let them come to us — it will save us from having to hunt these cowardly wretches in their dark dens."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “让这群懦弱的可怜虫尽管放马过来！这样一来，我们就不必亲自追到黑暗的巢穴之中，把他们杀个精光。”
languages.original_text: "Let them come to us — it will save us from having to hunt these cowardly wretches in their dark dens."

traits.locale_text: “让这群懦弱的可怜虫尽管放马过来！这样一来，我们就不必亲自追到黑暗的巢穴之中，把他们杀个精光。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Qu'ils viennent. Ça nous évitera d'avoir à les traquer jusque dans les tréfonds de leurs repaires. »
languages.original_text: "Let them come to us — it will save us from having to hunt these cowardly wretches in their dark dens."

traits.locale_text: « Qu'ils viennent. Ça nous évitera d'avoir à les traquer jusque dans les tréfonds de leurs repaires. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Pues que vengan... así nos ahorramos tener que buscar las guaridas de estas alimañas cobardes».
languages.original_text: "Let them come to us — it will save us from having to hunt these cowardly wretches in their dark dens."

traits.locale_text: «Pues que vengan... así nos ahorramos tener que buscar las guaridas de estas alimañas cobardes».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「来てもらおうじゃないか…そしたら、こんな卑怯な悪党どもを相手の暗い巣穴で狩らざるを得ない事態は避けられる」
languages.original_text: "Let them come to us — it will save us from having to hunt these cowardly wretches in their dark dens."

traits.locale_text: 「来てもらおうじゃないか…そしたら、こんな卑怯な悪党どもを相手の暗い巣穴で狩らざるを得ない事態は避けられる」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Sollen sie zu uns kommen — das erspart uns die Mühe, diesen feigen Abschaum in seinen dunklen Höhlen zu jagen."
languages.original_text: "Let them come to us — it will save us from having to hunt these cowardly wretches in their dark dens."

traits.locale_text: "Sollen sie zu uns kommen — das erspart uns die Mühe, diesen feigen Abschaum in seinen dunklen Höhlen zu jagen."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "Let them come to us — it will save us from having to hunt these cowardly wretches in their dark dens."

languages.text: "Gelsinler hele! O zaman bu korkak pislikleri karanlık inlerinde avlamak zorunda kalmayız!"
languages.original_text: "Let them come to us — it will save us from having to hunt these cowardly wretches in their dark dens."

traits.locale_text: "Bırakın gelsinler! O zaman bu korkak pislikleri karanlık inlerinde avlamak zorunda kalmayız!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
